about_the_game:
Tiny Frightened is a thrilling multiplayer game where you and your friends become voodoo dolls in a tiny and terrifying world, trying to evade an evil pursuer. With small objectives to complete and an emphasis on teamwork, players must work together to help their friends and sew their eyes back on... and their eyes are buttons! To open the exit and escape, players must also locate and open valves throughout the world. The thrill of being chased by the evil voodoo doll will have you on the edge of your seat as you work together to find safety. Join forces with your friends and see who will be the last voodoo doll standing in this exciting and frightening adventure!

Here are some features of Tiny Frightened:

Multiplayer: Play with up to four players, with a recommended minimum of two players.

Objectives: Complete objectives to progress through the game, including finding keys, destroying boxes, and finding buttons.

Help your Friends: Players can sew buttons back onto their voodoo doll friends to help them see again and avoid being caught by the evil pursuer.

Host Games: Players can host games for their friends and choose the level they want to play.

Thrilling Gameplay: The game's mix of cute and horror elements provides a thrilling and exciting gameplay experience.

Early Access: The game is available in Early Access, allowing players to get involved in the development process and provide feedback to help shape the game's future updates.
